item.description:

make sure thats for the right skills.

[/quote]
yeah make sure thoese codes are like eg player lvl [3] is hitpoints make sure its set right.[/quote]

Nice spam newb, literally replicating what the guy said before.

And Goodoo dolls, as long as I’ve been on these forums. Always on every server I have used attack is ID 0… Unless you can show me server that doesn’t don’t spam.

And thanks very much Project.

item.title: Minor error with potions
item.dc:creator: @Oo_Java Oo Java
item.description:
@Oo_Java wrote:

case 145: // super att (3) attPot = true; attPotTimer = 90; abc = getLevelForXP(playerXP[0]); cba = abc / 10; abc2 = cba * 2; if (abc2 <= 1) { abc2 = 2; } playerLevel[0] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[0]); playerLevel[0] += abc2; sendFrame126("@lre@" + playerLevel[0] + "", 4006); deleteItem(145, GetItemSlot(145), 1); addItem(147, 1); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; GoOn = false; break;

It’s the same with my super defence potion, basically it keeps boosting my ‘Strength’ level when I drink either my Super Attack/Defence potion, can you see anything wrong with this code?

Read full topic
